class_notes: This section is for MN semester 4 students only. This course contains a clinical component. Clinical may be scheduled any day not in lecture, including weekends for 12 hours; onsite simulation may be scheduled any day not in lecture except Sundays.
course_description: Students will use critical thinking to synthesize and apply their knowledge and skill in nursing care delivery to patients and families as part of an interdisciplinary team.
